What's The Use of Items?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battle Card Archive (Game Boy): Battles: What's The Use of Items?
By Anonymous on Friday, August 24, 2001 - 12:13 pm:

Could someone help me? I've given that suezo all my milkstuff, I'm stocked with items, and I don't know how to use the items!

By Anonymous on Friday, August 24, 2001 - 12:15 pm:

I know you use them for battles, but I can't find an item menu on the battle screen!

By cariy tiger on Thursday, October 18, 2001 - 03:27 pm:

you have to use the item before the battle

By Jose Mendoza on Wednesday, December 12, 2001 - 06:05 pm:

You need to press select and go to the option that says items. Selecting an item actually equips it so when you do battle you use the item.
Ex:Coinheads is a coin that is heads on both sides and when you battle the coin will land on heads. Alupper raises a monster's life points.

By Anonymous on Wednesday, January 2, 2002 - 09:22 am:

if you lose all three counters your items are taken ( all of them) you can use fly boots( you don't lose counters or items until they break) or luxe bagde( gives 2 extra counters)or rich badge ( gives 1 extra counter)
